Supply Chain Intelligence Release Notes 23.2

Release Date: 4/7/2023

  • Dashboard Updates  
  • Report Updates
  • Framework Updates

Dashboard Updates
 

The following table summarizes the updates made to the existing Operational SCI dashboards:

Dashboard Name New/Existing Change Description

Customer Engagement

 Existing

The following updates are made to the UI of the dashboard:

Renamed:

  • Non Resolved Cases to Open Cases (Day)
  • Avg Case Resolution Time (Hrs) to Average Resolution (Hrs)
  • Avg Appeasement to Average Appeasement (Case)
  • Avg Cases Resolved Per Day to Average Daily Resolutions
  • Avg Cases Created Per Day  to Average Cases (Day)
  • Dispute Amt Paid in Appeasement to Dispute Appeasements

Removed: 

  • Cases Resolved Per Month By Customer Type
  • Avg Case Resolution Time by Customer in Hours
  • Top/Bottom Performers by Case Priority

Updated Avg Case Resolution Time by Priority as a Line Graph representation and created Average Appeasements by Customer Type (Month) as part of the visualization

Customer Engagement Scorecard 

 Existing

The following updates are made to the UI of the dashboard:

Renamed:

  • Case Volume to Cases Assigned
  • Appeasement $ to Appeasements
  • Interaction Volume to Interactions
  • Resolved Case Volume to Resolved Cases
  • Cases  to Total Cases 
  • Appeasements to Total Appeasements
  • Interactions to Total Interactions
  • Resolved Cases to Total Resolutions

Removed: 

  • Top 5 categories of open cases
  • Case Load
  • Average Interaction Time
  • Cases by Resolution Time
  • First Call Resolution Rate by week
  • % of Customers resolved within 5 minutes

Updated the following to reflect the percentage for all users:

  • Cases to Total Cases 
  • Appeasements to Total Appeasements 
  • Interactions to Total Interactions
  • Resolved Cases to Total Resolutions

 

Report Updates

 

Operational SCI for v23.2 introduces Abandoned Orders and it is a part of Point of Sale Backoffice reports. Abandoned orders are orders that customers add to the shopping cart but do not convert into a purchase for reasons such as an app crash or forceful closure of the app. An increase in these orders might indicate a loss of customers, sales, and revenues. Operational SCI for Point of Sale includes the Abandoned Orders report, which helps retailers evaluate these orders and assign them to other customers who aim to buy. It also helps them analyze the reasons and take measures to minimize their occurrences.
 

Framework Updates

 

The following table summarizes the table additions to the existing packages. You can find more information by accessing the link provided for each package.

Package Name

  New/Existing

Change Description

Order Fulfillment

Existing

Added:

  • Order Line Fulfillment Detail, Order Release Line, and Order Quantity Detail to the Order Line table

  • Order Line Order Tracking Info to the Order Line Fulfillment Detail table

  • Order Created Users and Order Updated Users to the Order table

Order Management

Existing

Added:

  • Order Fulfillment Detail to the Order Tracking Info table

  • Invoice for Order Tracking Info to the Order Fulfillment Detail table

  • Order Release Line to the Order Line table

  • Order Created Users and Order Updated Users to the Order table

  • Parent Order Created Users and Parent Order Updated Users to the Parent Order table
